content: * please note that this is the ad-free printable pdf version of this pattern you can find the free version of this pattern at theturtletrunk com the country cottage cowl features beautiful texture from 2 easy crochet stitches the pattern includes 2 sizes child and adult but you can easily adjust the length and width to be any size this pattern works up quickly and easily and it s the perfect accessory for fall and winter make for holiday gifts for kids or adults sell at markets or make for yourself or kids if you enjoy this pattern check out the other patterns in the country cottage collection to make a set difficulty advanced beginner finished sizes child - 25 circumference / 8 width adult - 28 circumference / 10 width pattern includes - detailed written instructions for 2 sizes child and adult - instructions on how to adjust the circumference and width to be any size - gauge pattern - link to the free video tutorial - stitch and pattern photos for reference standard us crochet terms supplies needed medium 4 weight yarn 6 00mm j hook yarn needle & scissors
